hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:When the Prophet (ﷺ) performed the Tawaf of the Ka`ba, he did Ramal during the first three rounds and in the last four rounds he used to walk and while doing Tawaf between Safa and Marwa, he used to run in the midst of the rain water passage

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ طَافَ بِالْبَيْتِ إِذَا قَدِمَ مَكَّةَ، قَبْلَ أَنْ يَرْجِعَ إِلَى بَيْتِهِ، ثُمَّ صَلَّى رَكْعَتَيْنِ، ثُمَّ خَرَجَ إِلَى الصَّفَا
chapter.eng-name: Tawaf of the Ka'bah on reaching Makkah
